file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Starkina Maria
    email: starkina@surfstudio.ru
     
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT 

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

paths:
  /billings/balance:
    get:
      summary: Информация о балансе
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BalanceInfo"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /billings/basket:
    get:
      summary: Запрашиваем корзину услуг
      parameters:
        - name: smartCardOrAgreement
          required: false
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Номер Триколор ID для не авторизованной зоны 
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BasketItem"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /billings/paymentsInfo:
    post:
      summary: Запрашиваем доступные платежные системы и информацию о комиссиях
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentsInfoRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentTypeItem"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
    
  /billings/isPaymentAvailable:
    get:
      summary: Доступна ли оплата для пользователя
      parameters:
        - name: smartCardOrAgreement
          required: false
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Номер Триколор ID для не авторизованной зоны 
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/IsPaymentAvailableResponse"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /billings/payment:
    post:
      summary: Оплачиваем корзину
      parameters:
        - name: smartCardOrAgreement
          required: false
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Номер Триколор ID для не авторизованной зоны 
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json: 
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentDetailsRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/PaymentDetailsResponse"     
    
  /billings/contactInfo:
    get:
      summary: Запрос контактных данных пользователя
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/UserContactInfo"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
